column4: I read a bit on xinerama but never seen it working,  I us quicksynergy instead to make two computers act as one big screen, but not as cool as xinerama would be
hmm ok... I've been buying Nvidia for the last... couple of decades, guess I'll do that again to be sfe.
it seems the docs on xinerama I did see were old, hope it still working,  if it does I'd love to hear about it
